sentences.en: My younger sister is five years old.
sentences.zh: 我的妹妹五岁了。

sentences.en: He is younger than his brother.
sentences.zh: 他比他哥哥年轻。

sentences.en: My older brother is tall.
sentences.zh: 我的哥哥很高。

sentences.en: She looks older than her age.
sentences.zh: 她看起来比实际年龄大。

sentences.en: Tom is taller than his brother.
sentences.zh: 汤姆比他弟弟高。

sentences.en: The giraffe is taller than the elephant.
sentences.zh: 长颈鹿比大象高。

sentences.en: A shorter path is easier to walk.
sentences.zh: 一条更短的路更容易走。

sentences.en: My hair is shorter than yours.
sentences.zh: 我的头发比你的短。

sentences.en: This pencil is longer than that one.
sentences.zh: 这支铅笔比那支长。

sentences.en: She has longer hair than her sister.
sentences.zh: 她的头发比她姐姐/妹妹的长。

sentences.en: The ice cream cone is thinner than the cup.
sentences.zh: 蛋筒冰淇淋比杯子更细。

sentences.en: She used a thinner brush to paint the details.
sentences.zh: 她用更细的画笔来画细节。

sentences.en: A basketball is bigger than a tennis ball.
sentences.zh: 篮球比网球大。

sentences.en: My new house is bigger than the old one.
sentences.zh: 我的新房子比旧房子大。

sentences.en: This apple is smaller than that one.
sentences.zh: 这个苹果比那个小。

sentences.en: She chose the smaller book from the shelf.
sentences.zh: 她从书架上选了更小的那本书。

sentences.en: Exercise makes you stronger.
sentences.zh: 锻炼使你更强壮。

sentences.en: A stronger body can do more work.
sentences.zh: 更强壮的身体能做更多工作。

sentences.en: Dinosaurs lived millions of years ago.
sentences.zh: 恐龙生活在数百万年前。

sentences.en: Some dinosaurs were very large, like the T-Rex.
sentences.zh: 有些恐龙非常大，比如霸王龙。

sentences.en: We can have a party in the hall.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在大厅举办派对。

sentences.en: The hall is big and bright.
sentences.zh: 这个大厅又大又明亮。

sentences.en: The room is five metres long.
sentences.zh: 这个房间有五米长。

sentences.en: He walked 100 metres this morning.
sentences.zh: 他今天早上走了100米。

sentences.en: She is taller than her brother.
sentences.zh: 她比她哥哥高。

sentences.en: This book is more interesting than that one.
sentences.zh: 这本书比那本更有趣。

sentences.en: Both of my parents are teachers.
sentences.zh: 我的父母都是老师。

sentences.en: She likes both swimming and running.
sentences.zh: 她既喜欢游泳也喜欢跑步。

sentences.en: A kilogram is a unit of mass equal to 1000 grams.
sentences.zh: 一千克是等于1000克的质量单位。

sentences.en: My backpack weighs about two kilograms.
sentences.zh: 我的背包重约两千克。

sentences.en: The countryside is full of green fields and fresh air.
sentences.zh: 乡村到处是绿色的田野和新鲜的空气。

sentences.en: Many people like to visit the countryside to relax.
sentences.zh: 许多人喜欢去乡村放松。

sentences.en: Please write the word in lower case.
sentences.zh: 请用小写字母写这个单词。

sentences.en: Lower case letters are smaller than upper case ones.
sentences.zh: 小写字母比大写字母小。

sentences.en: The shadow grows longer in the afternoon.
sentences.zh: 影子在下午变得更长。

sentences.en: A tree's shadow moves with the sun.
sentences.zh: 树的影子随着太阳移动。

sentences.en: I want to become a teacher when I grow up.
sentences.zh: 我长大后想成为一名老师。

sentences.en: Water can become ice when it is cold.
sentences.zh: 天冷的时候水会变成冰。

sentences.en: The room is clean after we cleaned it.
sentences.zh: 我们打扫后，房间很干净。

sentences.en: She cleaned her desk before starting homework.
sentences.zh: 她在开始做作业前打扫了书桌。

sentences.en: She stayed at home yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天待在家里。

sentences.en: We stayed in a small hotel during the trip.
sentences.zh: 我们旅行期间住在一家小旅馆里。

sentences.en: She washed her hands before eating.
sentences.zh: 她吃饭前洗了手。

sentences.en: My mother washed the clothes yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈昨天洗了衣服。

sentences.en: She had a cat yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天有一只猫。

sentences.en: We had dinner at six o'clock.
sentences.zh: 我们六点钟吃了晚饭。

sentences.en: She had a cold last week.
sentences.zh: 她上周感冒了。

sentences.en: My brother had a cold and stayed home.
sentences.zh: 我弟弟感冒了，呆在家里。

sentences.en: She slept for eight hours last night.
sentences.zh: 她昨晚睡了八个小时。

sentences.en: The baby slept soundly in the cradle.
sentences.zh: 婴儿在摇篮里睡得很香。

sentences.en: I like to read books every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天读书。

sentences.en: Can you read this English story?
sentences.zh: 你能读这个英语故事吗？

sentences.en: I saw a bird in the tree.
sentences.zh: 我看见树上有一只鸟。

sentences.en: She saw her friend at the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天在公园看见了她的朋友。

sentences.en: This is the last book on the shelf.
sentences.zh: 这是书架上的最后一本书。

sentences.en: She came last in the race.
sentences.zh: 她在比赛中得了最后一名。

sentences.en: Yesterday was Monday.
sentences.zh: 昨天是星期一。

sentences.en: I went to the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我昨天去了公园。

sentences.en: I need to finish my homework before dinner.
sentences.zh: 我需要在晚饭前完成作业。

sentences.en: She arrived at the station before the train left.
sentences.zh: 她在火车离开前到达了车站。

sentences.en: She drank a glass of milk for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 她早餐喝了一杯牛奶。

sentences.en: They drank some juice at the party yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他们昨天在派对上喝了一些果汁。

sentences.en: Please show me your book.
sentences.zh: 请给我看你的书。

sentences.en: She can show us the way.
sentences.zh: 她可以给我们指路。

sentences.en: She reads a magazine every weekend.
sentences.zh: 她每个周末都读一本杂志。

sentences.en: My father bought a new magazine yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我爸爸昨天买了一本新杂志。

sentences.en: She is better at English than me.
sentences.zh: 她比我更擅长英语。

sentences.en: This book is better than that one.
sentences.zh: 这本书比那本更好。

sentences.en: He runs faster than his brother.
sentences.zh: 他跑得比他哥哥快。

sentences.en: Can you finish the work faster?
sentences.zh: 你能更快完成这项工作吗？

sentences.en: We stayed at a hotel during our vacation.
sentences.zh: 我们假期期间住在一家酒店。

sentences.en: The hotel has a swimming pool and a restaurant.
sentences.zh: 这家酒店有一个游泳池和一家餐厅。

sentences.en: The price of this book is fixed.
sentences.zh: 这本书的价格是固定的。

sentences.en: We have a fixed time for the meeting.
sentences.zh: 我们开会有固定的时间。

sentences.en: The old chair is broken.
sentences.zh: 这把旧椅子坏了。

sentences.en: He tried to fix the broken toy.
sentences.zh: 他试图修理那个坏了的玩具。

sentences.en: The lamp on the desk is bright.
sentences.zh: 桌子上的灯很亮。

sentences.en: I turn on the lamp when it's dark.
sentences.zh: 天黑的时候我会打开灯。

sentences.en: The music is too loud.
sentences.zh: 音乐太大声了。

sentences.en: Please don't speak so loud.
sentences.zh: 请不要这么大声说话。

sentences.en: I enjoy reading books.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢读书。

sentences.en: We enjoy playing games together.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢一起玩游戏。

sentences.en: I want to stay at home today.
sentences.zh: 我今天想待在家里。

sentences.en: Please stay here and wait for me.
sentences.zh: 请待在这里等我。

sentences.en: She went to the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天去了公园。

sentences.en: They went shopping after lunch.
sentences.zh: 他们午饭后去购物了。

sentences.en: We will go to summer camp next week.
sentences.zh: 我们下周要去夏令营。

sentences.en: They set up a camp by the river.
sentences.zh: 他们在河边搭了一个营地。

sentences.en: We went camping in the mountains last weekend.
sentences.zh: 上周末我们去山里露营了。

sentences.en: She loves to go camping with her family during summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天她喜欢和家人一起去露营。

sentences.en: The fish swims in the river.
sentences.zh: 鱼在河里游。

sentences.en: I like to eat fish for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我晚餐喜欢吃鱼。

sentences.en: He went fishing with his father yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他昨天和他爸爸去钓鱼了。

sentences.en: We often go fishing by the river on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我们周末经常去河边钓鱼。

sentences.en: They rode horses through the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 他们昨天骑马穿过了公园。

sentences.en: She rode her bike to school this morning.
sentences.zh: 她今天早上骑自行车去上学了。

sentences.en: He fell off the bike and hurt his knee.
sentences.zh: 他从自行车上摔下来，伤到了膝盖。

sentences.en: The sharp stone might hurt your feet.
sentences.zh: 这块尖石头可能会弄伤你的脚。

sentences.en: I ate an apple this morning.
sentences.zh: 我今天早上吃了一个苹果。

sentences.en: She ate dinner at seven o'clock.
sentences.zh: 她七点钟吃了晚饭。

sentences.en: It took me an hour to finish my homework.
sentences.zh: 完成作业花了我一个小时。

sentences.en: The journey took three days by train.
sentences.zh: 这次旅行乘火车花了三天时间。

sentences.en: She took pictures of the beautiful sunset.
sentences.zh: 她拍了美丽日落的照片。

sentences.en: We took pictures together at the park yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我们昨天在公园一起拍了照片。

sentences.en: She bought a new book yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天买了一本新书。

sentences.en: My parents bought me a bicycle for my birthday.
sentences.zh: 我父母为我的生日买了一辆自行车。

sentences.en: She gave me a gift on my birthday.
sentences.zh: 她在我生日那天给了我一份礼物。

sentences.en: The gift is wrapped in red paper.
sentences.zh: 这个礼物是用红纸包装的。

sentences.en: The apple fell from the tree.
sentences.zh: 苹果从树上掉了下来。

sentences.en: She fell down when running.
sentences.zh: 她跑步时摔倒了。

sentences.en: The light is off.
sentences.zh: 灯是关着的。

sentences.en: Please turn off the TV.
sentences.zh: 请关掉电视。

sentences.en: Labour Day is a holiday to honor workers.
sentences.zh: 劳动节是一个向劳动者致敬的节日。

sentences.en: People often have a day off on Labour Day.
sentences.zh: 人们通常在劳动节放假一天。

sentences.en: A mule is a hybrid animal, usually the offspring of a male donkey and a female horse.
sentences.zh: 骡子是一种杂交动物，通常是公驴和母马的后代。

sentences.en: Mules are known for their strength and endurance, often used as working animals.
sentences.zh: 骡子以其力量和耐力著称，常被用作役用动物。

sentences.en: Turpan is a famous city in Xinjiang, China, known for its grapes and hot weather.
sentences.zh: 吐鲁番是中国新疆的一座著名城市，以葡萄和炎热的天气而闻名。

sentences.en: Many tourists visit Turpan to experience its unique desert scenery and delicious fruits.
sentences.zh: 许多游客前往吐鲁番体验其独特的沙漠风光和美味的水果。

sentences.en: I could swim when I was five.
sentences.zh: 我五岁时就会游泳了。

sentences.en: Could you pass me the book, please?
sentences.zh: 请问你能把书递给我吗？

sentences.en: We will wait till the rain stops.
sentences.zh: 我们会等到雨停。

sentences.en: She worked till midnight yesterday.
sentences.zh: 她昨天工作到午夜。

sentences.en: We like to play on the beach.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在沙滩上玩。

sentences.en: The beach is full of sand and shells.
sentences.zh: 沙滩上满是沙子和贝壳。

sentences.en: She carries a basket to the market.
sentences.zh: 她提着一个篮子去市场。

sentences.en: The cat is sitting in the empty basket.
sentences.zh: 猫正坐在空篮子里。

sentences.en: This is a part of the machine.
sentences.zh: 这是机器的一部分。

sentences.en: I need to find the right part for the bike.
sentences.zh: 我需要找到自行车合适的零件。

sentences.en: The cat licked the milk from the bowl.
sentences.zh: 猫舔了碗里的牛奶。

sentences.en: She licked the ice cream cone happily.
sentences.zh: 她开心地舔着冰淇淋蛋筒。

sentences.en: Students often eat lunch in the dining hall.
sentences.zh: 学生们经常在食堂吃午饭。

sentences.en: The dining hall is usually crowded during meal times.
sentences.zh: 食堂在用餐时间通常很拥挤。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard is green and soft.
sentences.zh: 院子里的草又绿又软。

sentences.en: We should not step on the grass in the park.
sentences.zh: 我们不应该踩公园里的草。

sentences.en: She left the room five minutes ago.
sentences.zh: 她五分钟前离开了房间。

sentences.en: They finished their homework an hour ago.
sentences.zh: 他们一小时前完成了作业。

sentences.en: Cycling is a fun outdoor activity.
sentences.zh: 骑自行车是一项有趣的户外活动。

sentences.en: I go cycling with my friends every weekend.
sentences.zh: 我每个周末和朋友们一起去骑自行车。

sentences.en: I like to go cycling in the park on weekends.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢周末在公园骑自行车。

sentences.en: We often go cycling together after school.
sentences.zh: 我们放学后经常一起去骑自行车。

sentences.en: She loves to ice-skate on the frozen lake in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天她喜欢在结冰的湖面上滑冰。

sentences.en: We need warm clothes to ice-skate comfortably outdoors.
sentences.zh: 我们需要暖和的衣服才能在户外舒适地滑冰。

sentences.en: I often play badminton with my friends after school.
sentences.zh: 我经常放学后和朋友们打羽毛球。

sentences.en: Badminton is a popular sport that requires rackets and a shuttlecock.
sentences.zh: 羽毛球是一项需要球拍和羽毛球的流行运动。

sentences.en: The bright star shines in the sky at night.
sentences.zh: 明亮的星星在夜晚的天空中闪耀。

sentences.en: We can see many stars when we look up on a clear night.
sentences.zh: 在晴朗的夜晚抬头看，我们能看到很多星星。

sentences.en: This math problem is easy for me.
sentences.zh: 这道数学题对我来说很简单。

sentences.en: It's easy to learn English with practice.
sentences.zh: 通过练习学习英语很容易。

sentences.en: I need to look up the word in the dictionary.
sentences.zh: 我需要在字典里查阅这个单词。

sentences.en: She likes to look up information online.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在网上查找信息。

sentences.en: I use the Internet to search for information.
sentences.zh: 我使用互联网搜索信息。

sentences.en: The Internet connects people all over the world.
sentences.zh: 互联网连接着世界各地的人们。

sentences.en: Cats and dogs are different animals.
sentences.zh: 猫和狗是不同的动物。

sentences.en: Her opinion is different from mine.
sentences.zh: 她的观点和我的不同。

sentences.en: She is active in class discussions.
sentences.zh: 她在课堂讨论中很积极。

sentences.en: Playing sports keeps him active and healthy.
sentences.zh: 做运动让他保持活跃和健康。

sentences.en: We will have a race tomorrow.
sentences.zh: 我们明天将有一场比赛。

sentences.en: He won the first prize in the race.
sentences.zh: 他在比赛中获得了一等奖。

sentences.en: The word 'nothing' means there is not anything.
sentences.zh: 单词“nothing”的意思是没有任何东西。

sentences.en: If you have nothing, you don't have any objects or things.
sentences.zh: 如果你拥有“nothing”，就意味着你没有任何物品或东西。

sentences.en: I need to thought carefully before answering.
sentences.zh: 我需要仔细思考后再回答。

sentences.en: Her thought is different from mine.
sentences.zh: 她的想法和我的不同。

sentences.en: I felt happy when I saw the rainbow.
sentences.zh: 当我看到彩虹时，我感到很高兴。

sentences.en: She felt the soft fur of the cat.
sentences.zh: 她摸到了猫柔软的皮毛。

sentences.en: A cheetah is the fastest land animal.
sentences.zh: 猎豹是陆地上跑得最快的动物。

sentences.en: Cheetahs have black spots on their yellow fur.
sentences.zh: 猎豹黄色的皮毛上有黑色的斑点。

sentences.en: I went on a trip to the mountains last summer.
sentences.zh: 去年夏天我去山里旅行了。

sentences.en: We need to pack our bags for the upcoming trip.
sentences.zh: 我们需要为即将到来的旅行收拾行李。

sentences.en: She became woke to social issues after reading the book.
sentences.zh: 她读完这本书后，对社会问题有了清醒的认识。

sentences.en: Being woke means being aware of injustice around you.
sentences.zh: 保持清醒意味着意识到你周围的不公。

sentences.en: I had a sweet dream last night.
sentences.zh: 我昨晚做了一个甜美的梦。

sentences.en: Her dream is to become a doctor.
sentences.zh: 她的梦想是成为一名医生。
